short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a Chrome Web Clipper for the Draftio Digital Notes App.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Taking notes while browsing the web? Draftio app transforms those notes into actionable insights.  Boost your research productivity with Draftio, now enhanced with AI capabilities. 

The app integrates with this Draftio Chrome extension — simple, fast, and efficient bookmarking and note-taking tool. This web clipper allows you to store the selected content from any we page directly into your Draftio account. 

With Draftio and its intuitive Chrome extension, transform scattered notes into cohesive web Drafts effortlessly. Select your previously made notes with a few clicks, craft them effortlessly into a preferred format — be it bullet points, tables, slides, or text — and instantly share. 

What Draftio offers?
- Folders, projects & drafts organization structure
- Intuitive bookmarking tool for Chrome
- Flexible note structure with multiple field
- Inbox & outbox system for shared links
- Notes feed to browse, search, and filter
- Enhanced with AI capabilities: summarize, draft, interpret images, and refine search

What makes Draftio different?
- Draftio emphasizes the end result of your research — your initial draft. Customize your notes by grouping them into drafts, and styling them as bullet points, slides, text, or tables. 
- Add new notes, rearrange, adjust, and change styles until you achieve the desired outcome. Whether you want to share it via a generated link or keep it private, the choice is yours.
- Share your draft effortlessly with a generated link. For enhanced security, use Draftio capabilities to distribute a controlled access link.

Discover the power of organized, actionable notes with Draftio. Start making, compiling, and sharing your notes more efficiently today!
